course.title: Functional Medicine Mini Diploma

catalogue.short_description: Discover how to escape the broken healthcare system and build a $100k+ practice helping people actually heal — in just 9 lessons.
catalogue.long_description: Tired of 7-minute appointments and watching patients get sicker? This free Mini Diploma reveals the root-cause approach that's transforming healthcare. Learn why 40+ women with life experience are the PERFECT candidates for this $5.6 trillion industry. Includes real case studies, a clinical tool you can use today, and an income calculator to see your earning potential.
catalogue.hook: From Burned-Out Nurse to $144k/Year Practitioner — Working 3 Days a Week
catalogue.target_audience: Healthcare professionals, nurses, 40+ women seeking a meaningful second career

benefits: Understand why 60% of Americans have chronic illness that doctors can't fix
Learn the 7 Body Systems Model used by top practitioners
See real proof: How Michelle went from $72k nurse to $144k practitioner
Master a clinical tool (The Functional Timeline) you can use today
Calculate your potential income with our interactive calculator
Earn a Mini Diploma certificate upon completion
